heading: Engineering with a Product Mindset
subheading: Based in Pakistan, working with the world.
bio: I have spent the last 7 years navigating the full lifecycle of web development. Starting as a multi-stack freelancer, I embraced my 'multipotentialite' nature (combining technical engineering with roots in Graphic Design and Content Writing).

This diverse background gives me a unique empathy for the end-user. I don't just write functional code; I deliver solutions that are intuitive and easily maintainable, often acting as the bridge between engineering, design, and marketing teams.
Today, I focus on building scalable web architectures using React and Next.js, ensuring every pixel is intentional and every interaction is optimized for performance.

highlights.title: High-Growth Adaptability
highlights.description: Proven ability to hit a stride quickly and deliver dependable, high-quality results even when requirements are evolving or incomplete.

highlights.title: Design-Led Engineering
highlights.description: My background in Graphic Design ensures that 'Pixel-Perfect' isn't just a buzzword, it is a standard I maintain in every build.
